SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.EmployeeID , AA.DepartmentID , AA.MainYn , AA.Position , AA.StartDate , AA.EndDate
, BB.Name as DepartmentName , EE.Name as EmployeeName
FROM dbo.TAppointment AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.TDepartment BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.DepartmentID = BB.ID LEFT JOIN dbo.TEmployee EE WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.EmployeeID = EE.ID WHERE 1=1
AND ( AA.DepartmentID = #DepartmentID# )
AND ( AA.EmployeeID = #EmployeeID# )
ORDER BY RowNo
SELECT * FROM dbo.TAppointment AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#

INSERT INTO dbo.TAppointment ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, EmployeeID, DepartmentID, MainYn, Position, StartDate, EndDate, Description ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #EmployeeID#, #DepartmentID#, #MainYn#, #Position#, #StartDate#, #EndDate#, #Description# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TAppointment SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, EmployeeID = #EmployeeID# , DepartmentID = #DepartmentID# , MainYn = #MainYn# , Position = #Position# , StartDate = #StartDate# , EndDate = #EndDate# , Description = #Description# WHERE ID = #ID#
